title: Yevlakh City Stadium
text: Yevlakh City Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Yevlakh">Yevlakh</a>, <a href="Azerbaijan">Azerbaijan</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> matches. It serves as a home ground of <a href="FK%20Karvan">FK Karvan</a>. The stadium holds 5,000 people.
